import { {{EntityName}} } from '../{{EntityName}}.entity';
import { I{{EntityName}}Repository } from '../{{EntityName}}.repository';
import { I{{EntityName}}Create } from '../{{EntityName}}.interfaces';

export class Register{{EntityName}}UseCase {
  constructor(private readonly {{entityName}}Repository: I{{EntityName}}Repository) {}

  async execute(data: I{{EntityName}}Create): Promise<{{EntityName}}> {
    const {{entityName}} = await this.{{entityName}}Repository.register{{EntityName}}(data);
    return {{entityName}};
  }
}
